content.query:
SELECT
	   [CohortYearTTL]
      ,[DistrictType]
      ,[DistrictTTL]
      ,[SchoolTTL]
      ,[DemographicType]
      ,[DemographicGroup]
      ,[DemographicValue]
      ,[PSEnrollLevel]
      ,[Pct]
      ,[RedactedPct]
      ,[cohortType]
  ,[Local District]
  ,[SChool Name]
FROM
  staging.PostSecondary a
JOIN
  staging.CharterSchoolDirectory b
  ON SOUNDEX(a.SchoolTTL) = SOUNDEX(b.[School Name])
where SchoolTTL like '%Sierra%'
